header.title: Book Your Flight
footer.content.0: Please refer to Privacy Policy for details on how we handle your personal information.
footer.content.1: Â© SkyWings Airlines Limited ABN 12 345 678 901. Booking services provided by SkyWings Airlines Limited trading as {{airlineName}} Airways.
booking.main.title: Book Your Flight
booking.search.heading: What is a flexible booking?
booking.search.content.0: When you choose flexible booking, you can change your flight dates without any fees.
booking.search.content.1: Once you've selected your preferences, we'll show you the best available options:
booking.search.list.0: Different departure times throughout the day
booking.search.list.1: Various fare types to suit your needs
booking.search.list.2: Optional extras like seat selection or meals
booking.search.list.3: Alternative dates if you're flexible with timing
booking.whatINeedToKnow.heading: What do I need to know?
booking.whatINeedToKnow.content.0: Here are some important things to consider when booking your flight:
booking.whatINeedToKnow.list.0: Check your passport is valid for at least 6 months from your travel date
booking.whatINeedToKnow.list.1: Make sure all passenger names match their travel documents exactly
booking.whatINeedToKnow.list.2: Consider travel insurance for international flights
booking.online.heading: Manage your booking online
booking.online.content.0: Log in to view your booking details, select seats, add baggage and more.
booking.online.content.1: Forgot your booking reference? Use your email address to retrieve it.
booking.online.button.label: Log in
booking.contactUs.heading: Need help with your booking?
booking.contactUs.content: Call [{{bookingCentreNumber}}](tel:{{bookingCentreNumberTel}}) between Monday to Sunday - 24 hours a day.
booking.faq.heading: Common questions
booking.faq.content.0.heading: What if I need to change my flight?
booking.faq.content.0.content: You can change your flight online if:
booking.faq.content.0.list.0: You have a flexible fare type
booking.faq.content.0.list.1: Your flight is more than 24 hours away
booking.faq.content.0.list.2: You're travelling on the same route
booking.faq.content.0.bottomContent: If you need to make changes, visit Manage My Booking.
booking.faq.content.1.heading: How do I add extra baggage?
booking.faq.content.1.content: You can add extra baggage up until 3 hours before your flight departs.
booking.faq.content.2.heading: What meals are available?
booking.faq.content.2.content.0: We offer a range of meals to suit different dietary requirements.
booking.faq.content.2.content.1: Special meals must be requested at least 24 hours before departure.
